deathtouch.name: Deathtouch
deathtouch.description: Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.

double strike.name: Double Strike
double strike.description: This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.

enchant.name: Enchant
enchant.description: This Aura can only be attached to the specified type of permanent or player.

equip.name: Equip
equip.description: Pay the equip cost to attach this Equipment to a creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.

first strike.name: First Strike
first strike.description: This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description: You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.

flying.name: Flying
flying.description: This creature can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.

haste.name: Haste
haste.description: This creature can attack and use tap abilities the turn it comes under your control.

hexproof.name: Hexproof
hexproof.description: This permanent cannot be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

indestructible.name: Indestructible
indestructible.description: Damage and effects that say 'destroy' do not destroy this permanent.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: This creature can only be blocked by artifact creatures and creatures that share a color with it.

landwalk.name: Landwalk
landwalk.description: This creature is unblockable as long as the defending player controls a land of the specified type.

lifelink.name: Lifelink
lifelink.description: Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.

menace.name: Menace
menace.description: This creature cannot be blocked except by two or more creatures.

protection.name: Protection
protection.description: This permanent cannot be damaged, enchanted, equipped, blocked, or targeted by sources of the specified quality.

reach.name: Reach
reach.description: This creature can block creatures with flying.

shroud.name: Shroud
shroud.description: This permanent cannot be the target of spells or abilities.

trample.name: Trample
trample.description: This creature can deal excess combat damage to the defending player or planeswalker.

vigilance.name: Vigilance
vigilance.description: Attacking does not cause this creature to tap.

ward.name: Ward
ward.description: Whenever this permanent becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays the ward cost.

banding.name: Banding
banding.description: Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.

rampage.name: Rampage
rampage.description: Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +N/+N until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.

cumulative upkeep.name: Cumulative Upkeep
cumulative upkeep.description: At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.

flanking.name: Flanking
flanking.description: Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

phasing.name: Phasing
phasing.description: This permanent phases in and out at the beginning of your untap step. While phased out, it is treated as if it does not exist.

buyback.name: Buyback
buyback.description: You may pay the buyback cost in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.

shadow.name: Shadow
shadow.description: This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with shadow.

cycling.name: Cycling
cycling.description: Pay the cycling cost and discard this card to draw a card.

echo.name: Echo
echo.description: At the beginning of your upkeep, if this permanent came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.

horsemanship.name: Horsemanship
horsemanship.description: This creature can only be blocked by creatures with horsemanship.

fading.name: Fading
fading.description: This permanent enters with fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter. If you cannot, sacrifice this permanent.

kicker.name: Kicker
kicker.description: You may pay an additional kicker cost as you cast this spell for an enhanced effect.

flashback.name: Flashback
flashback.description: You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.

madness.name: Madness
madness.description: If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.

fear.name: Fear
fear.description: This creature can only be blocked by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.

morph.name: Morph
morph.description: You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for 3 mana. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.

amplify.name: Amplify
amplify.description: As this creature enters, reveal any number of cards from your hand that share a creature type with it. This creature enters with +1/+1 counters equal to the amplify value times the number of cards revealed.

provoke.name: Provoke
provoke.description: Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.

storm.name: Storm
storm.description: When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.

affinity.name: Affinity
affinity.description: This spell costs 1 less to cast for each permanent of the specified type you control.

entwine.name: Entwine
entwine.description: Pay the entwine cost to choose all modes of this spell instead of just one.

modular.name: Modular
modular.description: This creature enters with +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.

sunburst.name: Sunburst
sunburst.description: This permanent enters with a counter for each color of mana spent to cast it.

bushido.name: Bushido
bushido.description: Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +N/+N until end of turn.

soulshift.name: Soulshift
soulshift.description: When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value N or less from your graveyard to your hand.

splice.name: Splice
splice.description: As you cast a spell of the specified type, you may reveal this card and pay its splice cost to copy its text onto that spell.

offering.name: Offering
offering.description: You may cast this card any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a creature of the specified type and paying the difference in mana costs.

ninjutsu.name: Ninjutsu
ninjutsu.description: Pay the ninjutsu cost and return an unblocked attacking creature you control to its owner's hand to put this card onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

epic.name: Epic
epic.description: For the rest of the game, you cannot cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell.

convoke.name: Convoke
convoke.description: Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.

dredge.name: Dredge
dredge.description: If you would draw a card, you may mill cards equal to this card's dredge number and return this card from your graveyard to your hand instead.

transmute.name: Transmute
transmute.description: Pay the transmute cost and discard this card to search your library for a card with the same mana value, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

bloodthirst.name: Bloodthirst
bloodthirst.description: If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with +1/+1 counters on it.

haunt.name: Haunt
haunt.description: When this card is put into a graveyard from the battlefield or when it resolves, exile it haunting target creature. When that creature dies, you may use this card's ability again.

replicate.name: Replicate
replicate.description: When you cast this spell, you may pay its replicate cost any number of times. Copy it that many times.

forecast.name: Forecast
forecast.description: During your upkeep, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its forecast cost to activate its forecast ability.

graft.name: Graft
graft.description: This creature enters with +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature to it.

recover.name: Recover
recover.description: When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay this card's recover cost to return it from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile it.

ripple.name: Ripple
ripple.description: When you cast this spell, reveal the top cards of your library equal to the ripple number. You may cast any cards with the same name without paying their mana costs.

split second.name: Split Second
split second.description: As long as this spell is on the stack, players cannot cast spells or activate abilities that are not mana abilities.

suspend.name: Suspend
suspend.description: Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay its suspend cost and exile it with time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.

vanishing.name: Vanishing
vanishing.description: This permanent enters with time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.

absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.description: If a source would deal damage to this creature, prevent N of that damage.

aura swap.name: Aura Swap
aura swap.description: Pay the aura swap cost to exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.

delve.name: Delve
delve.description: Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for 1.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.description: Pay the fortify cost to attach this Fortification to a land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery.

frenzy.name: Frenzy
frenzy.description: Whenever this creature attacks and is not blocked, it gets +N/+0 until end of turn.

gravestorm.name: Gravestorm
gravestorm.description: When you cast this spell, copy it for each permanent put into a graveyard this turn.

poisonous.name: Poisonous
poisonous.description: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets poison counters.

transfigure.name: Transfigure
transfigure.description: Pay the transfigure cost and sacrifice this creature to search your library for a creature card with the same mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

champion.name: Champion
champion.description: When this creature enters, sacrifice it unless you exile another creature you control of the specified type. When this creature leaves, return the exiled card to the battlefield.

changeling.name: Changeling
changeling.description: This card is every creature type.

evoke.name: Evoke
evoke.description: You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, sacrifice it when it enters the battlefield.

hideaway.name: Hideaway
hideaway.description: This permanent enters tapped. When it does, look at the top cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom.

prowl.name: Prowl
prowl.description: You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a creature that shares a creature type with this spell.

reinforce.name: Reinforce
reinforce.description: Pay the reinforce cost and discard this card to put +1/+1 counters on target creature.

conspire.name: Conspire
conspire.description: As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.

persist.name: Persist
persist.description: When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

wither.name: Wither
wither.description: This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.

retrace.name: Retrace
retrace.description: You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.

devour.name: Devour
devour.description: As this creature enters, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters with +1/+1 counters equal to the devour value times the number of creatures sacrificed.

exalted.name: Exalted
exalted.description: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

unearth.name: Unearth
unearth.description: Pay the unearth cost to return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield.

cascade.name: Cascade
cascade.description: When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.

annihilator.name: Annihilator
annihilator.description: Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices permanents equal to the annihilator value.

level up.name: Level Up
level up.description: Pay the level up cost to put a level counter on this creature. Level up only as a sorcery.

rebound.name: Rebound
rebound.description: If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast it from exile without paying its mana cost.

totem armor.name: Totem Armor
totem armor.description: If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.

infect.name: Infect
infect.description: This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.

battle cry.name: Battle Cry
battle cry.description: Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

living weapon.name: Living Weapon
living weapon.description: When this Equipment enters, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.

undying.name: Undying
undying.description: When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

miracle.name: Miracle
miracle.description: You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.

soulbond.name: Soulbond
soulbond.description: You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.

overload.name: Overload
overload.description: You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of 'target' with 'each'.

scavenge.name: Scavenge
scavenge.description: Exile this card from your graveyard and pay its scavenge cost to put +1/+1 counters equal to this creature's power on target creature.

unleash.name: Unleash
unleash.description: You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. It cannot block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.

cipher.name: Cipher
cipher.description: You may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.

evolve.name: Evolve
evolve.description: Whenever a creature enters under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

extort.name: Extort
extort.description: Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay W/B. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.

fuse.name: Fuse
fuse.description: You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.

bestow.name: Bestow
bestow.description: If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.

tribute.name: Tribute
tribute.description: As this creature enters, an opponent of your choice may put +1/+1 counters on it. If they don't, an ability triggers.

inspired.name: Inspired
inspired.description: Whenever this creature becomes untapped, an ability triggers.

constellation.name: Constellation
constellation.description: Whenever an enchantment enters under your control, an ability triggers.

convoke.name: Convoke
convoke.description: Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.

outlast.name: Outlast
outlast.description: Pay the outlast cost and tap this creature to put a +1/+1 counter on it. Outlast only as a sorcery.

prowess.name: Prowess
prowess.description: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

dash.name: Dash
dash.description: You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and is returned to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

exploit.name: Exploit
exploit.description: When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a creature.

megamorph.name: Megamorph
megamorph.description: You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for 3 mana. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

renown.name: Renown
renown.description: When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.

awaken.name: Awaken
awaken.description: If you cast this spell for its awaken cost, also put +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

ingest.name: Ingest
ingest.description: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library.

rally.name: Rally
rally.description: Whenever a creature enters under your control, an ability triggers.

surge.name: Surge
surge.description: You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.

skulk.name: Skulk
skulk.description: This creature cannot be blocked by creatures with greater power.

emerge.name: Emerge
emerge.description: You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.

escalate.name: Escalate
escalate.description: Pay the escalate cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.

meld.name: Meld
meld.description: If you control both members of a meld pair, exile them, then meld them into a single oversized card.

crew.name: Crew
crew.description: Tap any number of creatures you control with total power N or more to turn this Vehicle into an artifact creature until end of turn.

fabricate.name: Fabricate
fabricate.description: When this creature enters, put +1/+1 counters on it, or create that many 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.

partner.name: Partner
partner.description: You can have two commanders if both have partner.

undaunted.name: Undaunted
undaunted.description: This spell costs 1 less to cast for each opponent.

improvise.name: Improvise
improvise.description: Each artifact you tap while casting this spell pays for 1.

revolt.name: Revolt
revolt.description: An ability that checks if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.description: Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.

embalm.name: Embalm
embalm.description: Pay the embalm cost and exile this card from your graveyard to create a token copy of it, except it's a white Zombie with no mana cost.

eternalize.name: Eternalize
eternalize.description: Pay the eternalize cost and exile this card from your graveyard to create a token copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.

afflict.name: Afflict
afflict.description: Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses life equal to the afflict value.

ascend.name: Ascend
ascend.description: If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.

assist.name: Assist
assist.description: Another player can pay up to the full cost of this spell.

jump-start.name: Jump-Start
jump-start.description: You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile it.

mentor.name: Mentor
mentor.description: Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.

surveil.name: Surveil
surveil.description: Look at the top cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top in any order.

undergrowth.name: Undergrowth
undergrowth.description: An ability that counts or cares about creature cards in your graveyard.

afterlife.name: Afterlife
afterlife.description: When this creature dies, create 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.

riot.name: Riot
riot.description: This creature enters with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.

spectacle.name: Spectacle
spectacle.description: You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost if an opponent lost life this turn.

adapt.name: Adapt
adapt.description: If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put +1/+1 counters on it.

addendum.name: Addendum
addendum.description: If you cast this spell during your main phase, you get an additional effect.

amass.name: Amass
amass.description: Put +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.

proliferate.name: Proliferate
proliferate.description: Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.

adventure.name: Adventure
adventure.description: Cast this as an Adventure, then exile it. You may cast the creature later from exile.

adamant.name: Adamant
adamant.description: If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, you get an additional effect.

food.name: Food
food.description: Food is an artifact type. Food tokens typically have: '2, Tap, Sacrifice this: You gain 3 life.'

escape.name: Escape
escape.description: You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.

mutate.name: Mutate
mutate.description: If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.

companion.name: Companion
companion.description: If you've fulfilled this card's companion requirement during deckbuilding, you may pay 3 to put it from outside the game into your hand once during the game.

cycling.name: Cycling
cycling.description: Pay the cycling cost and discard this card to draw a card.

boast.name: Boast
boast.description: Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.

foretell.name: Foretell
foretell.description: During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.

magecraft.name: Magecraft
magecraft.description: Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, an ability triggers.

ward.name: Ward
ward.description: Whenever this permanent becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays the ward cost.

learn.name: Learn
learn.description: You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.

daybound.name: Daybound
daybound.description: If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn. This permanent transforms.

nightbound.name: Nightbound
nightbound.description: If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn. This permanent transforms.

decayed.name: Decayed
decayed.description: This creature cannot block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

disturb.name: Disturb
disturb.description: You may cast this card transformed from your graveyard for its disturb cost.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in brackets.

training.name: Training
training.description: Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

casualty.name: Casualty
casualty.description: As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power N or greater. When you do, copy this spell.

connive.name: Connive
connive.description: Draw cards equal to the connive value, then discard that many cards. Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature for each nonland card discarded this way.

hideaway.name: Hideaway
hideaway.description: This permanent enters tapped. When it does, look at the top cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom.

blitz.name: Blitz
blitz.description: If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and 'When this creature dies, draw a card.' Sacrifice it at end of turn.

alliance.name: Alliance
alliance.description: Whenever another creature enters under your control, an ability triggers.

shield counter.name: Shield Counter
shield counter.description: If this creature would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.

read ahead.name: Read Ahead
read ahead.description: Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Skip chapters before that chapter.

enlist.name: Enlist
enlist.description: As this creature attacks, you may tap a non-attacking creature you control without summoning sickness. When you do, add its power to this creature's until end of turn.

domain.name: Domain
domain.description: An ability that counts or cares about the number of basic land types among lands you control.

prototype.name: Prototype
prototype.description: You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, power, and toughness using the prototype values.

unearth.name: Unearth
unearth.description: Pay the unearth cost to return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at end of turn or if it would leave the battlefield.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.description: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets poison counters equal to the toxic value.

corrupted.name: Corrupted
corrupted.description: An ability that checks if an opponent has three or more poison counters.

for mirrodin!.name: For Mirrodin!
for mirrodin!.description: When this Equipment enters, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token, then attach this to it.

oil counter.name: Oil Counter
oil counter.description: A counter type used by various Phyrexian cards for different effects.

incubate.name: Incubate
incubate.description: Create an Incubator token with +1/+1 counters on it. It has '2: Transform this artifact.' It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.

backup.name: Backup
backup.description: When this creature enters, put +1/+1 counters on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains this creature's abilities until end of turn.

battles.name: Battles
battles.description: A card type that enters with defense counters and can be attacked. When defeated, it transforms.

convoke.name: Convoke
convoke.description: Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.

craft.name: Craft
craft.description: Pay the craft cost and exile this permanent and other specified materials from among permanents you control and/or your graveyard. Return this card to the battlefield transformed.

discover.name: Discover
discover.description: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value N or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand.

finality counter.name: Finality Counter
finality counter.description: If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.

descend.name: Descend
descend.description: An ability that checks how many permanent cards are in your graveyard.

bargain.name: Bargain
bargain.description: You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell for an additional effect.

role token.name: Role Token
role token.description: An Aura enchantment token that attaches to a creature. Only one Role can be attached to a creature at a time.

celebration.name: Celebration
celebration.description: An ability that checks if two or more nonland permanents entered under your control this turn.

offspring.name: Offspring
offspring.description: You may pay an additional cost as you cast this spell. If you do, when this creature enters, create a 1/1 token copy of it.

saddle.name: Saddle
saddle.description: Tap creatures you control with total power N or more: This Mount becomes saddled until end of turn.

plot.name: Plot
plot.description: You may pay the plot cost and exile this card from your hand. Cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost.

spree.name: Spree
spree.description: Choose one or more additional costs. Add their effects to the spell.

impending.name: Impending
impending.description: If you cast this spell for its impending cost, it enters with time counters and isn't a creature until the counters are removed.

eerie.name: Eerie
eerie.description: Whenever an enchantment you control enters and whenever you fully unlock a Room, an ability triggers.

survival.name: Survival
survival.description: At the beginning of your second main phase, if this creature is tapped, an ability triggers.

manifest dread.name: Manifest Dread
manifest dread.description: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Put the other into your graveyard.

delirium.name: Delirium
delirium.description: An ability that checks if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

threshold.name: Threshold
threshold.description: An ability that checks if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard.

metalcraft.name: Metalcraft
metalcraft.description: An ability that checks if you control three or more artifacts.

landfall.name: Landfall
landfall.description: Whenever a land enters under your control, an ability triggers.

ferocious.name: Ferocious
ferocious.description: An ability that checks if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

formidable.name: Formidable
formidable.description: An ability that checks if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

spell mastery.name: Spell Mastery
spell mastery.description: An ability that checks if there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard.

raid.name: Raid
raid.description: An ability that checks if you attacked with a creature this turn.

morbid.name: Morbid
morbid.description: An ability that checks if a creature died this turn.

hellbent.name: Hellbent
hellbent.description: An ability that checks if you have no cards in hand.

kinship.name: Kinship
kinship.description: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with this creature, reveal it and trigger an ability.

heroic.name: Heroic
heroic.description: Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, an ability triggers.

battalion.name: Battalion
battalion.description: Whenever this creature and at least two other creatures attack, an ability triggers.

bloodrush.name: Bloodrush
bloodrush.description: Discard this card and pay its bloodrush cost to give target attacking creature bonuses until end of turn.

radiance.name: Radiance
radiance.description: An ability that affects the target and each other permanent/creature that shares a color with it.

imprint.name: Imprint
imprint.description: When this permanent enters or is used, exile a card from a specified zone. The exiled card affects this permanent's abilities.

eminence.name: Eminence
eminence.description: This ability works as long as this creature is in the command zone or on the battlefield.

partner with.name: Partner With
partner with.description: When this creature enters, target player may search their library for the named partner card and put it into their hand.

friends forever.name: Friends Forever
friends forever.description: You can have two commanders if both have friends forever.

choose a background.name: Choose a Background
choose a background.description: You can have a Background as a second commander.

doctor's companion.name: Doctor's Companion
doctor's companion.description: You can have two commanders if the other one is a Time Lord Doctor.

more than meets the eye.name: More Than Meets the Eye
more than meets the eye.description: You may cast this card converted for its alternate cost.

living metal.name: Living Metal
living metal.description: As long as it's your turn, this Vehicle is also a creature.
